iati-activity.title: Basa Health Project
iati-activity.description: The aim of this project is to support families and communities to ensure that children and women enjoy good health, are well nourished and protected.
iati-activity.activity-date: This is the start of the PPA contribution to this project, however the project was supported by other funding prior to this date.

contact-info.mailing-address: World Vision UK, Opal Drive, Fox Milne, Milton Keynes, MK15 0ZR, United Kingdom

iati-activity.sector: Programming for Improved Maternal Newborn and Child Health

budget.period-start: PPA funds for the World Vision 2011 and 2012 financial years.

transaction.description: The lifetime budget from the PPA grant for this project. The project is also supported by other funding sources.
The World Vision UK commitment to this project from the PPA in the financial years 2011-2012. The project is also supported by other funding sources.
